title: Hadd-Hajar-Clausura
description: Hadd-Hajar-Clausura, a modern appellation for a Roman-era linear barrier that is thought to have been part of the Limes Tripolitanus in the province of Africa Proconsularis.

properties.description: A point location based on coordinates published in GeoHack
properties.title: Imagery location of Hadd-Hajar-Clausura
